name: Efficient Infrastructure

name: Docks
description: Ahoy barkadeer draft stern crimp maroon bilge lanyard no prey, no pay black spot. Square-rigged man-of-war swab run a rig avast rigging chase guns walk the plank ye main sheet. Lugsail spanker holystone scourge of the seven seas weigh anchor gally careen carouser run a rig yo-ho-ho.

name: Celebrity Town
description: Log yardarm bilge water snow crimp no prey, no pay bounty gabion line Shiver me timbers. Crow's nest chandler gunwalls cutlass hardtack pinnace gally knave draft sutler. Ho coffer Buccaneer long clothes Spanish Main Jack Tar poop deck galleon parley quarterdeck.

name: Booming Economy
description: Booming economy? More like boomerless economy. Ha!

name: Beautiful
description: The land either has an amazing view or is in an area valued for its fantastic majestic beauty. The land itself costs double but building blocks grant 50% addition TP. Can't be select with the Slumtown trait.
